definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: Submarine motion at the periscope depth, will suffer the interference that comes from waves.
sentences.chinese: 潛艇在潛望鏡深度航行時，會受到來自波浪的干擾力。
簡單的潛望鏡使用平面鏡。

sentences.english: The captain of the submarine has got this periscope thing.
sentences.chinese: 那個潛艇艇長有個類似於潛望鏡之類的東西。

sentences.english: At periscope depth it can be located by the enemy's reconnaissance aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 在潛望鏡深度它能被敵人的偵察飛機定位。
